charges.charge_disposition: The dft pleaded guilty to count 1. The dft is hereby committed to the custody of the US BOP to be imprisoned for a term of 18 months. The dft is remanded to the custody of the USMS. Upon release from imprisonment, the dft shall be on supervised release for a term of three (3) years. The dft shall not possess a firearm or destructive device. If deported, the dft shall not enter the US without the approval of the Attorney General's Office and without prior notification to the US Attorney and the US Probation office for the Dist. of OR. It is ordered that the dft shall pay a special assessment of $50.00 for count 1 which shall be due immediately./s/9/27/91 by Judge Panner, sd 9/9/91, m 9/30/91 (1)
